explains: n. 名义；同名物；同名的人

sentences.en: The town of Breckenridge and its namesake ski area could prosper under the plan.
sentences.cn: 按照这一方案，布雷肯里奇镇及与其同名的滑雪区将会繁荣起来。

sentences.en: Unlike his more famous namesake, this Bill Clinton has little interest in politics.
sentences.cn: 这位比尔•克林顿和那位著名的同名人不同，对政治没什么兴趣。

sentences.en: He is putting together a four-man team, including his son and namesake Tony O'Reilly Jr.
sentences.cn: 他在组建一个四人团队，包括和自己同名的儿子小托尼·奥赖利。
